subtotal.translation[0].definitions[0].d: the total of a set of numbers, especially on a bill, that is added to other numbers, such as a tax, to form a complete total
subtotal.translation[1].definitions[0].d: the total of a set of numbers that is added to other numbers to form a complete total
subtotal.translation[1].definitions[0].e: We have grouped the costs under appropriate headings with subtotals for each group.
